created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the skill version was created.

description.description: Description of the skill version. This is extracted from the SKILL.md file in the skill upload.

directory.description: Directory name of the skill version. This is the top-level directory name that was extracted from the uploaded files.

id.description: Unique identifier for the skill version. The format and length of IDs may change over time.

name.description: Human-readable name of the skill version. This is extracted from the SKILL.md file in the skill upload.

skill_id.description: Identifier for the skill that this version belongs to.

type.description: Object type. For Skill Versions, this is always 'skill_version'.

version.description: Version identifier for the skill. Each version is identified by a Unix epoch timestamp (e.g., "1759178010641129").
